snippet.title: New Gameplay in The Bazaar | The Bazaar Update #19
snippet.description:
The Bazaar Big Update #2. https://republic.co/tempo-storm

We have a ton of new changes to showcase in our second big update for development of The Bazaar! Join Andrey and Ben as they provide an overview of the matchmaking system, monsters, economy, and more!

0:00 Start
0:38 Matchmaking System
6:02 Scaling & Item Churn
14:53 Journey of a Day
18:39 Monsters & Replay
25:41 Economy
29:04 Gameplay

Welcome to The Bazaar!

An Intergalactic Marketplace full of dangers and wonder. Experience infinite replayability in this dynamic free-to-play, strategy game, where players battle commercial rivals for wealth and glory.

Join us on our channel for frequent updates on The Making of The Bazaar!

Become a patron of The Bazaar! Click Subscribe and comment below to support. 
If you enjoyed the video, follow us on social media:

https://YouTube.com/PlayTheBazaar?sub_confirmation=1

https://discord.gg/Hg3ytgZ
https://twitter.com/PlayTheBazaar 
https://instagram.com/PlayTheBazaar
https://facebook.com/The-Bazaar-405063150290933
https://www.reddit.com/r/PlayTheBazaar/

#TheBazaar #TempoStorm #TempoGames
